ygData.subject: NetKernel experience reports
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anybody here done anything serious with NetKernel s REST micro-kernel ? What did you think? I know Steve is connected to the company, and Hugh and Bill

Subject: NetKernel experience reports
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=221647988

Has anybody here done anything serious with NetKernel's "REST micro-kernel"?

What did you think?

I know Steve is connected to the company, and Hugh and Bill have at
least played around.  Their opinions are interesting, but real
independent deployed apps would be even more interesting.

Available on the Web would be even better.
